SELECT count(UserCode) FROM ( SELECT UserCode, URName FROM ( SELECT cm.UserCode, bg.DeptName ,targetdate , TRUNCATE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), targetdate)/7,0) WeekDay , IFNULL(SUM(AttAc),0) AttAc , IFNULL(SUM(ExtenAc),0) ExtenAc , IFNULL(SUM(HoliAc),0) HoliAc , covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, ou.MultiDisplayName) URName FROM attendance_commuting_mst cm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup bg ON cm.UserCode = bg.UserCode AND bg.JobType = 'Origin' JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user ou ON ou.UserCode = cm.UserCode JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group og ON bg.CompanyCode = og.CompanyCode AND og.GroupType='Dept' AND bg.DeptCode = og.GroupCode AND MemberOf != 'NOUSE' WHERE targetDate between STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 month), INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND og.GroupPath LIKE CONCAT(#{DeptCode},'%') GROUP BY cm.UserCode, WeekDay ) a
WHERE URName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
GROUP BY UserCode
, TRUNCATE(WeekDay/1,0)
, TRUNCATE(WeekDay/2,0)
, TRUNCATE(WeekDay/3,0)
HAVING IFNULL(SUM(ExtenAc),0)+IFNULL(SUM(HoliAc),0)>0 ) a

SELECT rh.UserCode , rh.RewardMonth , StartDate , case when DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 month), INTERVAL -1 DAY) < EndDate then DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 month), INTERVAL -1 DAY) else EndDate end EndDate , AttAc , ExtenAc , HoliAc , ExtenDAc , ExtenNAc , HoliDAc , HoliNAc , OffDAc , OffNAc , URName , TRUNCATE((RewardTime+IFNULL(CarryTime,0))/60/8,0) RewardDay , RewardTime RewardTime , IFNULL(CarryTime,0) CarryTime , (RewardTime+IFNULL(CarryTime,0)) - TRUNCATE((RewardTime+IFNULL(CarryTime,0))/60/8,0)*60*8 RemainTime , vh.RewardVacDay , vh.Status , covi_smart4j.Fn_GetBaseCodeName(#{domainID}, 'AttendState', vh.Status) StatusName , vh.Comment , DeptName FROM ( SELECT UserCode, DeptName , WeekDay , (SELECT covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = a.UserCode) AS URName , IFNULL(SUM(AttAc),0) AttAc , IFNULL(SUM(ExtenAc),0) ExtenAc , IFNULL(SUM(HoliAc),0) HoliAc , IFNULL(SUM(ExtenDAc),0) ExtenDAc , IFNULL(SUM(ExtenNAc),0) ExtenNAc , IFNULL(SUM(HoliDAc),0) HoliDAc , IFNULL(SUM(HoliNAc),0) HoliNAc , IFNULL(SUM(OffDAc),0) OffDAc , IFNULL(SUM(OffNAc),0) OffNAc , covi_smart4j.fn_attend_getAttDayRewardTime(IFNULL(SUM(AttAc),0), IFNULL(SUM(ExtenDAc),0), IFNULL(SUM(ExtenNAc),0), IFNULL(SUM(HoliDAc),0), IFNULL(SUM(HoliNAc),0), IFNULL(SUM(OffDAc),0), IFNULL(SUM(OffNAc),0), DomainID) RewardTime , SUBSTRING(#{RewardMonth},1,4) RewardYear , #{RewardMonth} RewardMonth ,(SELECT remainTime FROM covi_smart4j.vm_vacationplan_history vhr WHERE vhr.UR_Code = UserCode AND vhr.RewardMonth = date_format(DATE_SUB( STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},'01'),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%m') LIMIT 1) CarryTime , DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL (WeekDay)*7 DAY) StartDate
, DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL (WeekDay+1)*7-1 DAY) EndDate
, DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL (WeekDay+2)*7-1 DAY) EndDate
, DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL (WeekDay+3)*7-1 DAY) EndDate
, DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 month), INTERVAL -1 DAY) EndDate
FROM ( SELECT cm.UserCode, bg.DeptName , do.DomainID , targetdate , TRUNCATE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), targetdate)/7,0) WeekDay , IFNULL(SUM(AttAc),0) AttAc , IFNULL(SUM(ExtenAc),0) ExtenAc , IFNULL(SUM(HoliAc),0) HoliAc , IFNULL(SUM(case when ame.JobStsName = 'O' AND (cm.AttEndTime is not null and cm.AttEndTime >= cm.ExtenEnd) then covi_smart4j.fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{NightStartTime}, #{NightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'D') ELSE 0 END),0) ExtenDAc , IFNULL(SUM(case when ame.JobStsName = 'O' AND (cm.AttEndTime is not null and cm.AttEndTime >= cm.ExtenEnd) then covi_smart4j.fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{NightStartTime}, #{NightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'N') ELSE 0 END),0) ExtenNAc , IFNULL(SUM(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='0' AND ahs.HolidayName is NULL AND (cm.AttStartTime is not null and cm.AttStartTime <= cm.HoliStart AND cm.AttEndTime is not null and cm.AttEndTime >= cm.HoliEnd) then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'D') ELSE 0 END),0) HoliDAc , IFNULL(SUM(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='0' AND ahs.HolidayName is NULL AND (cm.AttStartTime is not null and cm.AttStartTime <= cm.HoliStart AND cm.AttEndTime is not null and cm.AttEndTime >= cm.HoliEnd) then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'N') ELSE 0 END),0) HoliNAc , IFNULL(SUM(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND (ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='2' OR (ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='0' AND ahs.HolidayName is not NULL) ) AND (cm.AttStartTime is not null and cm.AttStartTime <= cm.HoliStart AND cm.AttEndTime is not null and cm.AttEndTime >= cm.HoliEnd) then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'D') ELSE 0 END),0) OffDAc , IFNULL(SUM(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND (ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='2' OR (ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='0' AND ahs.HolidayName is not NULL) ) AND (cm.AttStartTime is not null and cm.AttStartTime <= cm.HoliStart AND cm.AttEndTime is not null and cm.AttEndTime >= cm.HoliEnd) then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'N') ELSE 0 END),0) OffNAc FROM attendance_commuting_mst cm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup bg ON cm.UserCode = bg.UserCode AND bg.JobType = 'Origin' JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group og ON bg.CompanyCode = og.CompanyCode AND og.GroupType='Dept' AND bg.DeptCode = og.GroupCode AND MemberOf != 'NOUSE' LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_extensionholiday ame ON cm.UserCode = ame.UserCode AND cm.targetdate = ame.jobDate AND ame.ApprovalSts = 'Y' LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain do ON cm.CompanyCode = do.DomainCode LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_holiday_schedule ahs ON ahs.CompanyCode = cm.CompanyCode AND cm.targetDate between ahs.HolidayStart AND ahs.HolidayEnd WHERE targetDate between STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{RewardMonth},#{RewardStandardDay}),'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 month), INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND og.GroupPath LIKE CONCAT(#{DeptCode},'%') GROUP BY cm.UserCode, WeekDay ) a GROUP BY UserCode
, TRUNCATE(WeekDay/1,0)
, TRUNCATE(WeekDay/2,0)
, TRUNCATE(WeekDay/3,0)
) rh LEFT JOIN vm_vacationplan_history vh ON rh.RewardYear = vh.YEAR AND rh.UserCode = vh.UR_Code AND rh.RewardMonth= vh.RewardMonth AND rh.StartDate = vh.RewardStartDate
WHERE ExtenAc+HoliAc+IFNULL(CarryTime,0)>0
AND URName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
ORDER BY UserCode, StartDate
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.vm_vacationplan (UR_Code, YEAR, VacDay, VacKind, UseStartDate, UseEndDate, DeptCode, DeptName, VmComment, RegistDate) VALUES (#{UserCode}, #{Year}, #{RewardDay}, #{VacKind}, CONCAT(#{Year},'0101'), CONCAT(#{Year},'1231'), #{DeptCode}, #{DeptName}, #{ApprovalComment}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE VacDay = ifnull(VacDay,0)+#{RewardDay} , VmComment = CONCAT(ifnull(VmComment,''),'|',#{ApprovalComment})

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.vm_vacationplan (UR_Code, YEAR, VacDay, VacKind, UseStartDate, UseEndDate, DeptCode, DeptName, VmComment, RegistDate) VALUES (#{UserCode}, #{Year}, #{RewardDay}, #{VacKind} , CONCAT(#{Year},(select DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REPLACE(EnterDate,'-',''),'%Y%m%d'),'%m%d') from covi_smart4j.sys_object_user where UserCode = #{UserCode})) , CONCAT(#{Year},(select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(REPLACE(EnterDate,'-',''),'%Y%m%d'),INTERVAL 12 MONTH),INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%m%d') from covi_smart4j.sys_object_user where UserCode = #{UserCode})) , #{DeptCode}, #{DeptName}, #{ApprovalComment} , NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE VacDay = ifnull(VacDay,0)+#{RewardDay} , VmComment = CONCAT(ifnull(VmComment,''),'|',#{ApprovalComment})
mapper.select: SELECT count(ExHoSeq) FROM attendance_commuting_mst cm JOIN attendance_mng_extensionholiday ame ON cm.UserCode = ame.UserCode AND cm.targetdate = ame.jobDate AND ame.ApprovalSts = 'Y' WHERE targetDate between STR_TO_DATE(#{StartDate},'%Y%m%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{EndDate},'%Y%m%d') AND cm.UserCode =#{UserCode}

SELECT UserCode, TargetDate , CONCAT(AttDayStartTime,' ~ ', AttDayEndTime) AS AttDayTime , CONCAT(StartTime,' ~ ', EndTime) AS AttExtDayTime , AttDayStartTime, AttDayEndTime, StartTime, EndTime , WorkTime, JobStsName, HolidayFlag , CASE WHEN JobStsName = 'O' THEN ExtenAc ELSE HoliAc END AS ExtenAc , CASE WHEN JobStsName = 'O' THEN ExtenDAc ELSE CASE WHEN HolidayFlag = '2' THEN OffDAc ELSE HoliDAc END END AS ExtenDAc , CASE WHEN JobStsName = 'O' THEN ExtenNAc ELSE CASE WHEN HolidayFlag = '2' THEN OffNAc ELSE HoliNAc END END AS ExtenNAc , IF(AssYn='Y',AttDayAc,AttReal)+ IF(AssYn='Y',0,VacTime) AttAc FROM ( SELECT cm.UserCode,TargetDate , AttAc, ExtenAc, HoliAc ,date_format(cm.AttDayStartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AttDayStartTime ,date_format(cm.AttDayEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AttDayEndTime ,date_format(ame.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') StartTime ,date_format(ame.EndTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') EndTime ,ame.WorkTime ,ame.JobStsName ,ame.HolidayFlag , IFNULL(case when ame.JobStsName = 'O' then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{NightStartTime}, #{NightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'D') ELSE 0 END,0) ExtenDAc , IFNULL(case when ame.JobStsName = 'O' then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{NightStartTime}, #{NightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'N') ELSE 0 END,0) ExtenNAc , IFNULL(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='0' then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'D') ELSE 0 END,0) HoliDAc , IFNULL(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='0' then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'N') ELSE 0 END,0) HoliNAc , IFNULL(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='2' then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'D') ELSE 0 END,0) OffDAc , IFNULL(case when ame.JobStsName = 'H' AND ifnull(ame.HolidayFlag,'0')='2' then fn_attend_getNightDayTimeV2(ame.StartTime, ame.EndTime, #{HoliNightStartTime}, #{HoliNightEndTime}, ame.IdleTime, 'N') ELSE 0 END,0) OffNAc , case when DATE_FORMAT(#{UR_TimeZone},'%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(j.JobDate,'%Y%m%d') THEN 0 else j.AttDayAc end AttDayAc , IFNULL(j.AssYn,'N') AssYn , case when CAST(ame.HolidayFlag AS INTEGER) >= 1 then 0 else IFNULL(cm.AttReal,0) end AttReal , case when IFNULL(CAST(ame.HolidayFlag AS INTEGER),0) >= 1 then IFNULL(j.AttDayAC,0) else case when IFNULL(CAST(ame.HolidayFlag AS INTEGER),0) > 0 then IFNULL(j.AttDayAC,0)*IFNULL(CAST(ame.HolidayFlag AS INTEGER),0) else case when j.WorkSts = 'HOL' AND j.AttDayAC>0 then j.AttDayAC else 0 END end end VacTime FROM attendance_commuting_mst cm LEFT JOIN attendance_mng_job j ON cm.UserCode = j.UserCode AND cm.targetdate = j.JobDate JOIN attendance_mng_extensionholiday ame ON cm.UserCode = ame.UserCode AND cm.targetdate = ame.jobDate AND ame.ApprovalSts = 'Y' WHERE targetDate between STR_TO_DATE(#{StartDate},'%Y%m%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{EndDate},'%Y%m%d') AND cm.UserCode =#{UserCode} ) TBL
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
